section_title: FORUM AND WORK PROGRAMME ON THE IMPACT OF THE IMPLEMENTATION OF RESPONSE MEASURES:
sentences: Chair Chruszczow informed parties that the Forum will convene during this session.

The following agenda items were briefly considered and forwarded for further consideration to contact groups or informal groups: composition, modalities and procedures of the team of technical experts under international consultations and analysis; matters relating to finance; developing country NAMAs; Convention Article 6 (education, training and public awareness); Non Annex I national communications; Protocol Article 3.14 (adverse effects); Loss and damage; and Convention Articles 4.8 and 4.9 (adverse effects and LDCs).
